PORTFOLIO SITE

Tailwind CSS

Welcome to my portfolio site, created during the Web Visualization course. Leveraging Tailwind CSS for its efficiency and quick page-building capabilities, I aimed to deepen my expertise in the utility-first CSS framework, while selecting a visually appealing and cohesive color scheme and utilizing Inconsolata and Montserrat fonts for their web-friendly attributes to convey a clean, playful, and simple aesthetic. The logo, crafted using Inkscape, adds a professional touch, and subtle keyframe animations enhance the site's visual appeal.
